verses.verse: <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> in his <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> was with <S%H1431>him,<s%> and magnified him <S%H4605>exceedingly.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and to the <S%H8199>judges,<s%> and to every <S%H7218>prince<s%> in all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households.

So <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> with <S%H3212>him,<s%> went to the high <S%H1116>place<s%> that was at <S%H1391>Gibeon;<s%> for there was the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

<S%H61>But<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> had brought the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5927>up<s%> from Kiriath <S%H7157>Jearim<s%> to the place that <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for <S%H5186>it;<s%> for he had pitched a <S%H168>tent<s%> for it at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Moreover the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> had <S%H6213>made,<s%> was <S%H7760>there<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> and the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> were seeking counsel <S%H1875>there.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> there to the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which was at the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> one <S%H505>thousand<s%> burnt offerings on <S%H5930>it.<s%>
In that <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> appeared to <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7592>him,<s%> "Ask what I shall give <S%H5414>you.<s%>"

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> "You have <S%H6213>shown<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and have made me king in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

<S%H3068>Now,<s%> Yahweh <S%H430>God,<s%> let your <S%H1697>promise<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> be <S%H539>established;<s%> for you have made me <S%H4427>king<s%> over a <S%H5971>people<s%> like the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> in <S%H7227>multitude.<s%>

Now <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4093>knowledge,<s%> that I may go <S%H3318>out<s%> and come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> this <S%H5971>people;<s%> for who can <S%H8199>judge<s%> this your <S%H5971>people,<s%> that is so <S%H1419>great?<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> "Because this was in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and you have not <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H6239>riches,<s%> <S%H6239>wealth,<s%> or <S%H3519>honor,<s%> nor the <S%H5315>life<s%> of those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7592>you,<s%> neither yet have asked <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>life;<s%> but have <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4093>knowledge<s%> for <S%H8199>yourself,<s%> that you may judge my <S%H5971>people,<s%> over whom I have made you <S%H4427>king:<s%>

<S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4093>knowledge<s%> is <S%H5414>granted<s%> to <S%H5414>you.<s%> I will give you <S%H6239>riches,<s%> <S%H6239>wealth,<s%> and <S%H3519>honor,<s%> such as none of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> have had who have been <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H310>you;<s%> neither shall there any after you have the like."

So <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the high <S%H1116>place<s%> that was at <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen:<s%> and he had one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> that he <S%H3240>placed<s%> in the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and with the <S%H4428>king<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> to be in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> as <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H730>cedars<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> he to be as the sycamore <S%H8256>trees<s%> that are in the <S%H8219>lowland,<s%> for <S%H7230>abundance.<s%>

The <S%H5483>horses<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had were <S%H4161>brought<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and from <S%H4723>Kue;<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5503>merchants<s%> <S%H3947>purchased<s%> <S%H4242>them<s%> from <S%H4723>Kue.<s%>

They brought <S%H5927>up<s%> and brought <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> a <S%H4818>chariot<s%> for <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and a <S%H5483>horse<s%> for one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty:<s%> and so for all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> they brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> by their <S%H3027>means.<s%>
